column1: Regular traffic reports will resume Monday November 23 at 4:00 p.m.

column3: I-64E at 104 MM in Clark Co:
column4: The interstate is shutdown about 6 miles east of the Bert T Combs Mountain Pkwy interchange due to a serious collision.

column3: I-64E at 104 MM in Clark Co:
column4: All eastbound traffic is reportedly being diverted to Exit 101 / US-60.

column3: I-75/I-71 at Brent Spence Bridge (Cincinnati Area):
column4: The bridge is closed until further notice due to fire damage from a previous collision.

column3: I-75/I-71 at Brent Spence Bridge (Cincinnati Area):
column4: Details, detours, and updates from the KY Transportation Cabinet.

column3: I-75/I-71 at Brent Spence Bridge (Cincinnati Area):
